page.title: 06LEISURE
page.content: {CHILDREN: }clubs:e.g.Brownies,Scouts; sport:e.g.gymnastics,karate,badminton; dancing,drama,ballet. {YOUNG ADULTS:}clubs:e.g.youth clubs, Guides, scouts; cooking; sport.e.g. football, trampolining, cricket, rounders, basketball.{ {ADULTS:}clubs:e.g.cookery, art club, typewriting, coffee morning, pottery, gardening, sewing; sport:e.g. darts, bingo, skittles, table tennis, football. {OLD PEOPLE:}clubs:e.g. church, darts, bingo, trips; sport: e.g.snooker, tennis, bowling. {GENERAL PASTIMES: }watching tv, riding bikes, swimming, fishing, painting, football, coffee mornings, jogging, gardening, walking,painting, going to the park.
